About Me


Creator

Hello,
My Name is Theo Bouras and i play periodically online microstakes mtt tournaments under the nickname trixakias.
Whenever i play poker and i find myself at a short stack situation i shove accordingly to Nash Equillibrium PDF shoving charts i have and it works pretty well i can tell.
I am also a passionate developer so i decided to take those charts and make this free tool in order to help you.
